channel.title: [basic] having connection issues
channel.description: Ok i posted eailer on how to connect to myself no i have another issue at hand i have port forwarded the correct port i have a no-ip with the desired domain i ask my friend to test if he can log on and he cannot is there somewhere in my source that i have to add my no-ip that i want to use so they can connect? because on my client if i make the ip 127.0.0.1; i connect just fine but if i used my no-ip domain it dosen't work possibly there is something wrong that some1 can tell me thanks

item.title: [basic] having connection issues
